intro: Spermacoce cardiophora, commonly known as the heartleaf spermacoce, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa and Asia. The plant typically grows as an annual herb with opposite, heart-shaped leaves that give it its common name. Its fruits are capsule-like structures that release tiny seeds when mature. Spermacoce cardiophora is often found in moist, shaded areas and is sometimes used in traditional medicine.
